## Analysis of MPG vs Weight

Here's a plot:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt)) +
    geom_point() +
    ggtitle("Scatterplot of MPG vs Weight")
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Also:

```{r}
mtcars |> head() |> knitr::kable()
```
